input.sentences: first they stopped by the market for fruit and meat .
then they walked through the town .
they stopped at the gas station for a drink .
then they went to the beach .
output.sentences: This Tahitian market is the best place for fresh produce.
The selections of store made meats and breads are served by uniformed attendants.
It may look a little sketchy from the exterior.
But it blends in well with the rest of the tiny village's decor.
And conveniently located near one of the most desolate and beautiful beaches in the world.
